text: Stadio Giovanni Zini is a football stadium in Cremona, Italy. It is currently the home of U.S. Cremonese. The stadium was built in 1929 and holds 20,641. ==History== The stadium was named after , a goalkeeper of U.S. Cremonese who died during the World War I. On 16 November 2013, it hosted Italy's end-of- year rugby union international against Fiji and won 37 - 31. ==References== Venue Giovanni Zini Giovanni Category:Cremona
title: Stadio Giovanni Zini
